explanations.deep learning: The paper proposes a deep learning model to predict the mental health of first-generation students, indicating the use of deep learning techniques.
explanations.neural network: Deep learning models are typically based on neural networks, so the mention of deep learning implies the use of neural networks.
explanations.classification: Predicting mental health can be framed as a classification problem, where the model categorizes students' mental health status based on behavioral factors.
